application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Conditions 9 (Slope Stability Assessment), 10 (Waterway Wall Survey) and 11 (Waterway Risk Assessment and Method Statement) for the Demolition Phase outside of the Canal Exclusion Zone only of planning consent reference 73955/APP/2021/3362 dated 20-01-2022 for 'Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2 and 3 of application reference 73955/APP/2020/139 (Demolition of existing buildings for residential-led mixed use development comprising buildings between 3 and 11 storeys to provide residential units (Use Class C3) and ground floor employment floorspace (Use Class B1) with associated access and car and cycle parking, landscape and amenity areas and associated servicing) to link internal corridors, relocate the consented gym use, relocate a duplex unit, change duplex units to single level, amend the refuse strategy and amend the layout of the car park & cycle stores'.
decision_conditions: The applicant is advised that this consent relates to the partial discharge for the Demolition Phase outside of the Canal Exclusion Zone only of Conditions 9 (Slope Stability Assessment), 10 (Waterway Wall Survey) and 11 (Waterway Risk Assessment and Method Statement) of planning consent reference 73955/APP/2021/3362.

A further application to discharge the conditions for any demolition within the Canal Exclusion Zone and/or the Construction Phase across the site is required in order to fully discharge Conditions 9 (Slope Stability Assessment), 10 (Waterway Wall Survey) and 11 (Waterway Risk Assessment and Method Statement).
